name: cnf2dd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w3, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w3, w2)))

stmt.origin: syl6(w0, w1, wo(w3, w2), wo(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wo(w2, w3), wo(w3, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wo(w2, w3), wo(w3, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))

comment: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)
